00546 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
00547 static inline void rtdm_context_lock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00548 {
00549         atomic_inc(&context->close_lock_count);
00550 }
00551 
00552 static inline void rtdm_context_unlock(struct rtdm_dev_context *context)
00553 {
00554         atomic_dec(&context->close_lock_count);
00555 }

00561 static inline nanosecs_abs_t rtdm_clock_read(void)
00562 {
00563         return xntbase_ticks2ns(rtdm_tbase, xntbase_get_time(rtdm_tbase));
00564 }
00565 
00566 static inline nanosecs_abs_t rtdm_clock_read_monotonic(void)
00567 {
00568         return xntbase_ticks2ns(rtdm_tbase, xntbase_get_jiffies(rtdm_tbase));
00569 }

00580 /* --- spin lock services --- */
00618 #ifdef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Beautify doxygen output */
00619 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)     \
00620 {                                               \
00621         <ENTER_ATOMIC_SECTION>                  \
00622         code_block;                             \
00623         <LEAVE_ATOMIC_SECTION>                  \
00624 }
00625 #else /* This is how it really works */
00626 #define RTDM_EXECUTE_ATOMICALLY(code_block)             \
00627 {                                                       \
00628         spl_t __rtdm_s;                                 \
00629                                                         \
00630         xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, __rtdm_s);          \
00631         code_block;                                     \
00632         xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, __rtdm_s);       \
00633 }
00634 #endif
00635 
00645 #define RTDM_LOCK_UNLOCKED      RTHAL_SPIN_LOCK_UNLOCKED
00646 
00648 typedef rthal_spinlock_t rtdm_lock_t;
00649 
00651 typedef unsigned long rtdm_lockctx_t;
00652 
00668 #define rtdm_lock_init(lock)    rthal_spin_lock_init(lock)
00669 
00686 #ifdef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Beautify doxygen output */
00687 #define rtdm_lock_get(lock)     rthal_spin_lock(lock)
00688 #else /* This is how it really works */
00689 #define rtdm_lock_get(lock)                                     \
00690         do {                                                    \
00691                 XENO_BUGON(RTDM, !rthal_local_irq_disabled());  \
00692                 rthal_spin_lock(lock);                          \
00693         } while (0)
00694 #endif
00695 
00712 #define rtdm_lock_put(lock)     rthal_spin_unlock(lock)
00713 
00731 #define rtdm_lock_get_irqsave(lock, context)    \
00732         rthal_spin_lock_irqsave(lock, context)
00733 
00751 #define rtdm_lock_put_irqrestore(lock, context) \
00752         rthal_spin_unlock_irqrestore(lock, context)
00753 
00770 #define rtdm_lock_irqsave(context)      \
00771         rthal_local_irq_save(context)
00772 
00789 #define rtdm_lock_irqrestore(context)   \
00790         rthal_local_irq_restore(context)

00876 /* --- non-real-time signalling services --- */
00877 
00883 typedef unsigned rtdm_nrtsig_t;
00884 
00895 typedef void (*rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t)(rtdm_nrtsig_t nrt_sig, void *arg);
00898 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
00899 static inline int rtdm_nrtsig_init(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig,
00900                                    rtdm_nrtsig_handler_t handler, void *arg)
00901 {
00902         *nrt_sig = rthal_alloc_virq();
00903 
00904         if (*nrt_sig == 0)
00905                 return -EAGAIN;
00906 
00907         rthal_virtualize_irq(rthal_root_domain, *nrt_sig, handler, arg, NULL,
00908                              IPIPE_HANDLE_MASK);
00909         return 0;
00910 }
00911 
00912 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_destroy(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00913 {
00914         rthal_free_virq(*nrt_sig);
00915 }
00916 
00917 static inline void rtdm_nrtsig_pend(rtdm_nrtsig_t *nrt_sig)
00918 {
00919         rthal_trigger_irq(*nrt_sig);
00920 }
00921 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

00944 enum rtdm_timer_mode {
00946         RTDM_TIMERMODE_RELATIVE = XN_RELATIVE,
00947 
00949         RTDM_TIMERMODE_ABSOLUTE = XN_ABSOLUTE,
00950 
00952         RTDM_TIMERMODE_REALTIME = XN_REALTIME
00953 };
00958 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid broken doxygen output */
00959 #define rtdm_timer_init(timer, handler, name)           \
00960 ({                                                      \
00961         xntimer_init((timer), rtdm_tbase, handler);     \
00962         xntimer_set_name((timer), (name));              \
00963         0;                                              \
00964 })
00965 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */
00966 
00967 void rtdm_timer_destroy(rtdm_timer_t *timer);
00968 
00969 int rtdm_timer_start(rtdm_timer_t *timer, nanosecs_abs_t expiry,
00970                      nanosecs_rel_t interval, enum rtdm_timer_mode mode);
00971 
00972 void rtdm_timer_stop(rtdm_timer_t *timer);
00973 
00974 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
00975 static inline int rtdm_timer_start_in_handler(rtdm_timer_t *timer,
00976                                               nanosecs_abs_t expiry,
00977                                               nanosecs_rel_t interval,
00978                                               enum rtdm_timer_mode mode)
00979 {
00980         return xntimer_start(timer, xntbase_ns2ticks_ceil(rtdm_tbase, expiry),
00981                              xntbase_ns2ticks_ceil(rtdm_tbase, interval),
00982                              (xntmode_t)mode);
00983 }
00984 
00985 static inline void rtdm_timer_stop_in_handler(rtdm_timer_t *timer)
00986 {
00987         xntimer_stop(timer);
00988 }
00989 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

00991 /* --- task services --- */
00997 typedef xnthread_t rtdm_task_t;
00998 
01004 typedef void (*rtdm_task_proc_t)(void *arg);
01005 
01010 #define RTDM_TASK_LOWEST_PRIORITY       XNSCHED_LOW_PRIO
01011 #define RTDM_TASK_HIGHEST_PRIORITY      XNSCHED_HIGH_PRIO
01012 
01018 #define RTDM_TASK_RAISE_PRIORITY        (+1)
01019 #define RTDM_TASK_LOWER_PRIORITY        (-1)
01020 
01024 int rtdm_task_init(rtdm_task_t *task, const char *name,
01025                    rtdm_task_proc_t task_proc, void *arg,
01026                    int priority, nanosecs_rel_t period);
01027 int __rtdm_task_sleep(xnticks_t timeout, xntmode_t mode);
01028 void rtdm_task_busy_sleep(nanosecs_rel_t delay);
01029 
01030 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01031 static inline void rtdm_task_destroy(rtdm_task_t *task)
01032 {
01033         xnpod_delete_thread(task);
01034 }
01035 
01036 void rtdm_task_join_nrt(rtdm_task_t *task, unsigned int poll_delay);
01037 
01038 static inline void rtdm_task_set_priority(rtdm_task_t *task, int priority)
01039 {
01040         union xnsched_policy_param param = { .rt = { .prio = priority } };
01041         xnpod_set_thread_schedparam(task, &xnsched_class_rt, &param);
01042         xnpod_schedule();
01043 }
01044 
01045 static inline int rtdm_task_set_period(rtdm_task_t *task,
01046                                        nanosecs_rel_t period)
01047 {
01048         if (period < 0)
01049                 period = 0;
01050         return xnpod_set_thread_periodic(task, XN_INFINITE,
01051                                          xntbase_ns2ticks_ceil
01052                                          (xnthread_time_base(task), period));
01053 }
01054 
01055 static inline int rtdm_task_unblock(rtdm_task_t *task)
01056 {
01057         int res = xnpod_unblock_thread(task);
01058 
01059         xnpod_schedule();
01060         return res;
01061 }
01062 
01063 static inline rtdm_task_t *rtdm_task_current(void)
01064 {
01065         return xnpod_current_thread();
01066 }
01067 
01068 static inline int rtdm_task_wait_period(void)
01069 {
01070         XENO_ASSERT(RTDM, !xnpod_unblockable_p(), return -EPERM;);
01071         return xnpod_wait_thread_period(NULL);
01072 }
01073 
01074 static inline int rtdm_task_sleep(nanosecs_rel_t delay)
01075 {
01076         return __rtdm_task_sleep(delay, XN_RELATIVE);
01077 }
01078 
01079 static inline int
01080 rtdm_task_sleep_abs(nanosecs_abs_t wakeup_date, enum rtdm_timer_mode mode)
01081 {
01082         /* For the sake of a consistent API usage... */
01083         if (mode != RTDM_TIMERMODE_ABSOLUTE && mode != RTDM_TIMERMODE_REALTIME)
01084                 return -EINVAL;
01085         return __rtdm_task_sleep(wakeup_date, (xntmode_t)mode);
01086 }
01087 
01088 /* rtdm_task_sleep_abs shall be used instead */
01089 static inline int __deprecated rtdm_task_sleep_until(nanosecs_abs_t wakeup_time)
01090 {
01091         return __rtdm_task_sleep(wakeup_time, XN_REALTIME);
01092 }
01093 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

01105         DECLARE_XNSELECT(select_block);
01106 } rtdm_event_t;
01107 
01108 #define RTDM_EVENT_PENDING              XNSYNCH_SPARE1
01109 
01110 void rtdm_event_init(rtdm_event_t *event, unsigned long pending);
01111 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT
01112 int rtdm_event_select_bind(rtdm_event_t *event, rtdm_selector_t *selector,
01113                            enum rtdm_selecttype type, unsigned fd_index);
01114 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT */
01115 #define rtdm_event_select_bind(e, s, t, i) ({ (void)(e); -EBADF; })
01116 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT */
01117 int rtdm_event_wait(rtdm_event_t *event);
01118 int rtdm_event_timedwait(rtdm_event_t *event, nanosecs_rel_t timeout,
01119                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
01120 void rtdm_event_signal(rtdm_event_t *event);
01121 
01122 void rtdm_event_clear(rtdm_event_t *event);
01123 
01124 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01125 void __rtdm_synch_flush(xnsynch_t *synch, unsigned long reason);
01126 
01127 static inline void rtdm_event_pulse(rtdm_event_t *event)
01128 {
01129         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, event_pulse, "event %p", event);
01130         __rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, 0);
01131 }
01132 
01133 static inline void rtdm_event_destroy(rtdm_event_t *event)
01134 {
01135         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, event_destroy, "event %p", event);
01136         __rtdm_synch_flush(&event->synch_base, XNRMID);
01137         xnselect_destroy(&event->select_block);
01138 }
01139 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

01143 typedef struct {
01144         unsigned long value;
01145         xnsynch_t synch_base;
01146         DECLARE_XNSELECT(select_block);
01147 } rtdm_sem_t;
01148 
01149 void rtdm_sem_init(rtdm_sem_t *sem, unsigned long value);
01150 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT
01151 int rtdm_sem_select_bind(rtdm_sem_t *sem, rtdm_selector_t *selector,
01152                          enum rtdm_selecttype type, unsigned fd_index);
01153 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT */
01154 #define rtdm_sem_select_bind(s, se, t, i) ({ (void)(s); -EBADF; })
01155 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_RTDM_SELECT */
01156 int rtdm_sem_down(rtdm_sem_t *sem);
01157 int rtdm_sem_timeddown(rtdm_sem_t *sem, nanosecs_rel_t timeout,
01158                        rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
01159 void rtdm_sem_up(rtdm_sem_t *sem);
01160 
01161 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01162 static inline void rtdm_sem_destroy(rtdm_sem_t *sem)
01163 {
01164         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, sem_destroy, "sem %p", sem);
01165         __rtdm_synch_flush(&sem->synch_base, XNRMID);
01166         xnselect_destroy(&sem->select_block);
01167 }
01168 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

01179                          rtdm_toseq_t *timeout_seq);
01180 
01181 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01182 static inline void rtdm_mutex_unlock(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
01183 {
01184         XENO_ASSERT(RTDM, !xnpod_asynch_p(), return;);
01185 
01186         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, mutex_unlock, "mutex %p", mutex);
01187 
01188         if (unlikely(xnsynch_release(&mutex->synch_base) != NULL))
01189                 xnpod_schedule();
01190 }
01191 
01192 static inline void rtdm_mutex_destroy(rtdm_mutex_t *mutex)
01193 {
01194         trace_mark(xn_rtdm, mutex_destroy, "mutex %p", mutex);
01195 
01196         __rtdm_synch_flush(&mutex->synch_base, XNRMID);
01197 }
01198 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */
01199 
01200 /* --- utility functions --- */
01201 
01202 #define rtdm_printk(format, ...)        printk(format, ##__VA_ARGS__)
01203 
01204 #ifndef DOXYGEN_CPP /* Avoid static inline tags for RTDM in doxygen */
01205 static inline void *rtdm_malloc(size_t size)
01206 {
01207         return xnmalloc(size);
01208 }
01209 
01210 static inline void rtdm_free(void *ptr)
01211 {
01212         xnfree(ptr);
01213 }

01215 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE
01216 int rtdm_mmap_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01217                       void *src_addr, size_t len,
01218                       int prot, void **pptr,
01219                       struct vm_operations_struct *vm_ops,
01220                       void *vm_private_data);
01221 int rtdm_iomap_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01222                        unsigned long src_addr, size_t len,
01223                        int prot, void **pptr,
01224                        struct vm_operations_struct *vm_ops,
01225                        void *vm_private_data);
01226 int rtdm_munmap(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info, void *ptr, size_t len);
01227 
01228 static inline int rtdm_read_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01229                                     const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01230 {
01231         return access_rok(ptr, size);
01232 }
01233 
01234 static inline int rtdm_rw_user_ok(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01235                                   const void __user *ptr, size_t size)
01236 {
01237         return access_wok(ptr, size);
01238 }
01239 
01240 static inline int rtdm_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01241                                       void *dst, const void __user *src,
01242                                       size_t size)
01243 {
01244         return __xn_copy_from_user(dst, src, size) ? -EFAULT : 0;
01245 }
01246 
01247 static inline int rtdm_safe_copy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01248                                            void *dst, const void __user *src,
01249                                            size_t size)
01250 {
01251         return (!access_rok(src, size) ||
01252                 __xn_copy_from_user(dst, src, size)) ? -EFAULT : 0;
01253 }
01254 
01255 static inline int rtdm_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01256                                     void __user *dst, const void *src,
01257                                     size_t size)
01258 {
01259         return __xn_copy_to_user(dst, src, size) ? -EFAULT : 0;
01260 }
01261 
01262 static inline int rtdm_safe_copy_to_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01263                                          void __user *dst, const void *src,
01264                                          size_t size)
01265 {
01266         return (!access_wok(dst, size) ||
01267                 __xn_copy_to_user(dst, src, size)) ? -EFAULT : 0;
01268 }
01269 
01270 static inline int rtdm_strncpy_from_user(rtdm_user_info_t *user_info,
01271                                          char *dst,
01272                                          const char __user *src, size_t count)
01273 {
01274         if (unlikely(!access_rok(src, 1)))
01275                 return -EFAULT;
01276         return __xn_strncpy_from_user(dst, src, count);
01277 }
01278 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
01279 /* Define void user<->kernel services that simply fail */
01280 #define rtdm_mmap_to_user(...)          ({ -ENOSYS; })
01281 #define rtdm_munmap(...)                ({ -ENOSYS; })
01282 #define rtdm_read_user_ok(...)          ({ 0; })
01283 #define rtdm_rw_user_ok(...)            ({ 0; })
01284 #define rtdm_copy_from_user(...)        ({ -ENOSYS; })
01285 #define rtdm_safe_copy_from_user(...)   ({ -ENOSYS; })
01286 #define rtdm_copy_to_user(...)          ({ -ENOSYS; })
01287 #define rtdm_safe_copy_to_user(...)     ({ -ENOSYS; })
01288 #define rtdm_strncpy_from_user(...)     ({ -ENOSYS; })
01289 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
01290 
01291 static inline int rtdm_in_rt_context(void)
01292 {
01293         return (rthal_current_domain != rthal_root_domain);
01294 }
01295 #endif /* !DOXYGEN_CPP */

01298                     rtdm_user_info_t *user_info, void *arg,
01299                     rtdm_rt_handler_t handler);
